Paralympics Australia has announced athletes must be vaccinated if they want to go to Tokyo.
  • Some aspiring Paralympians have refused to have the COVID-19 vaccination

articles.author: Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon
articles.title: Donovan Mitchell 'upset' at Utah Jazz for late call to sit him for Game 1, but says focus is now on Game 2 - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Jazz star Donovan Mitchell said Monday he is "upset" at his team's decision to make him a late scratch for Game 1 against the Grizzlies on Sunday, but he has been cleared to return for Game 2.
articles.content: Utah Jazz star guard Donovan Mitchell acknowledged Monday he was "definitely frustrated and upset" with the late decision to scratch him from Sunday's playoff opener but emphasized focusing on moving… [+3744 chars]
